solution_line_template: As she gave {given_one_balloon} balloon out, {floated_away} balloons floated away plus she gave away {gave_away_more} more balloons so she is down {given_one_balloon}+{floated_away}+{gave_away_more} = <<{given_one_balloon}+{floated_away}+{gave_away_more}={total_lost_balloons}>>{total_lost_balloons} balloons

She started with {started_balloons} and gave/lost {total_lost_balloons} balloons so she has {started_balloons}-{total_lost_balloons} = <<{started_balloons}-{total_lost_balloons}={remaining_after_loss}>>{remaining_after_loss} balloons

She also took her coworkers last {coworker_balloons} balloons so her new total is {remaining_after_loss}+{coworker_balloons} = <<{remaining_after_loss}+{coworker_balloons}={final_balloons}>>{final_balloons} balloons
